data.persona: I am tourist visiting another kingdom. I come from afar. I have visited the docks and shipyard.
data.description:
You are in the Stonehenge.
Technical and advanced, the enormous stones stand looking as if they are placed on top of each other by divine design. The green grass is a stark contrast to the gray stones hovering in the distance.
There's some dirt, some green grass, and a litter here.
A tour guide is here.

You are carrying a map, a coin purse, and a bag, and wearing some boots and a tunic.

data.short_motivation: I need to unpack my sleeping equipment and set up a camp
data.mid_motivation: I need to sleep outside at Stonehenge
data.long_motivation: I plan to sleep outside under the stars at major sites across the kingdom i am visiting

timeline.action: put sleeping bag in grass surface
